## OrientedBox3.distanceToPoint() method

Returns the distance from this \[\[OrientedBox3\]\] and the given `point`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  point | Vector3 | A point. |
